sentences.en: I enumerate the work that will have to be done.
sentences.cn: 我将必须要做的工作一一列举出来。

sentences.en: Let us try to enumerate some of the alternatives between which parents are forced to decide.
sentences.cn: 让我们试着列举一些家长们不得不做出决定的选择。

sentences.en: The heroic deeds of the people's soldiers are too numerous to enumerate.
sentences.cn: 人民子弟兵的事迹举不胜举。
